Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.TimeZoneSysSettingMessage.Value
Item.Value:
The following time zone is used for displaying dates:

  1. The time zone specified in your User profile.
  2. If the profile time zone is not set, the default time zone will be used (specified in the "Time zone by default" system setting).

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.TimeZoneUserProfileMessage.Value
Item.Value:
Time zones can be displayed in three different ways:

  1. The time zone specified in your profile,
  2. System setting “Time zone by default”,
  3. Time zone “Time in UTC”.

You can configure time zone inside your "User profile " or contact system administrator.
